decision_conditions: <p>Details to be approved (general)</p><p>Detailed drawings and full particulars of the following shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to the commencement of works.&nbsp; The works shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved:</p><ul><li>Details of the proposed bin store including its full dimensions and materials;</li><li>Details of the proposed railings and gate in the form of detailed drawings or a manufacturerâ€™s specification.</li></ul><p><br></p><p>REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the area in conformity with Section 72 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and National Planning Policy Framework, July 2021, Paragraphs 189 to 208; The London Plan 2021 Policy HC1 Heritage conservation and growth; and Hackney Local Plan 2033, Policies LP1 Design Quality and Local Character, LP3 Designated Heritage Assets and LP4 Non Designated Heritage Assets.</p><div><br></div>

<p>Details of Materials</p><p>Full details, including physical samples, of all the materials to be used on the external surfaces of the boundary treatment, including, but not limited to the brickwork, coping stones for the wall top and pier capping stones, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before any work commences on site. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</p><p><br></p><p>REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the area in conformity with Section 72 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 and National Planning Policy Framework, July 2021, Paragraphs 189 to 208; The London Plan 2021 Policy HC1 Heritage conservation and growth; and Hackney Local Plan 2033, Policies LP1 Design Quality and Local Character, LP3 Designated Heritage Assets and LP4 Non Designated Heritage Assets.</p><div><br></div>

The Development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 18(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended.

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
description: Alterations to the front garden gate and wall
